Detailed Description

A thread used for searching for a file...

This class is a thread that is designated for searching for content in a specified set of folders.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Constructor. Creates a new instance of this search thread

Member Function Documentation

void DzSearchFileThread::addFolder ( DzSearchFolderPtr  folder  ) 

Adds folder to the list of folders to search for

Parameters:
folder The new folder to add to the list of folders to searchs
void DzSearchFileThread::clearFolders (  ) 

Remvoes all folders from this search thread

void DzSearchFileThread::run (  )  [virtual]

Runs this thread and performs a search. A search container must be set and a valid regular expression must be set or this method will have no effect.

See also:
setContainer()
setMatchExp()
void DzSearchFileThread::setCleanOrphansOnFinish ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets whether to clean up orphans on scan complete

Parameters:
onoff true if clean orphans, false to not
void DzSearchFileThread::setContainer ( DzSearchContainerPtr  con  ) 

Sets the search container for this search to store results in

Parameters:
con The search container to use for storing search results
void DzSearchFileThread::setFinishObject ( QObject *  obj  ) 

Sets the object to be used as a callback when the search has finished.

Parameters:
obj The object to be used when the search is finished. It must have a slot called finishSearch().
void DzSearchFileThread::setMatchExp ( const QRegExp &  exp  ) 

Sets the regular expression to use as criteria for a match

Parameters:
exp The regular expression to search for
void DzSearchFileThread::setProgressObject ( QObject *  obj  ) 

Sets the object to be used as a callback for displaying progress

Parameters:
obj The object to be used for displaying progress. It must have two slots in order for this to work: setRange(int, int) and setValue(int)
void DzSearchFileThread::stopSearch (  ) 

Stops the currently running search
